I tried it out but it didn't work
This is a module augmentation -- it's in addition to the types already in `node`.

Sure, I'm happy to do this in this PR if @jdforsythe is on board.  I'm a bit of a n00b at this so forgive the stupid question, but: would these interfaces sit under the `PinoHttp` namespace? I would think this would be a breaking change for users of this package. Or do they simply sit at the top level of this module?

In fact I'm not sure how this change wouldn't be breaking for consumers, given the point of the package is to add a `log` property for use within http handlers. Presumably anyone using this package would have to change their handlers to reference the new interface rather than the `http` one?
